Name: Berry People
About the game: üèõÔ∏è Explore over 20 different areas üçÖ More than 100 berries to photograph üêå A few minigames here and there üå≤ At least 783 trees, maybe more Berry People is a game where you take photos of as many berries as you can find! You can find these silly creatures hiding everywhere in the forest. Explore each area fully to discover all of its secrets! Take a breath of fresh air while relaxing in a field of flowers, climb a very tall hill or take your time and try to count all of the falling -- Wait is that a berry? Quickly! Take a picture! This game is pretty short, because we like them that way. come and take a look at our jpegs Berry People was commissioned by Sokpop Collective, an indie game studio from The Netherlands who make small games for 3$/month. Thank you, Sokpop!
